meanings.sent1: Her constant complaints were unconstructive and did not offer any solutions.
meanings.sent2: The unconstructive criticism only served to discourage the team.
meanings.sent3: His unconstructive behavior in the group project made everyone roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: The unconstructive atmosphere in the meeting room stifled creativity.
meanings.sent5: The unconstructive feedback left the students feeling lost and unsure.

meanings.definition: Tending to hinder or obstruct progress.
meanings.sent1: The unconstructive roadblocks delayed the project completion.
meanings.sent2: Her unconstructive actions caused unnecessary delays in the schedule.
meanings.sent3: The unconstructive traffic jam on the highway made everyone late.
meanings.sent4: The unconstructive barriers in communication prevented any real progress.
meanings.sent5: The unconstructive rules only served to slow down the process.
